text: Step Forward () is a Soviet film-an almanac, consisting of five novels. ==Plot== Five novels, united by the history of the nascent love of two elderly people, meeting every day on the way to work. Meeting every day in public transport, they do not suspect that they are neighbors around the house, and they are constantly giving each other a lot of trouble.Шаг навстречу.
